questiontext.text: Read in the csv file located at "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eugene100hickey/ATU-2023/main/rexams/data/Methane_final.csv". This gives global methane emissions for (mostly) 2022. Calculate the total emissions due to Energy from Asia Pacific.

generalfeedback.text: Use read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eugene100hickey/ATU-2023/main/rexams/data/Methane_final.csv") followed by group_by(type, region) |> summarise(total = sum(emmisions)) |> ungroup().

questiontext.text: Read in the csv file located at "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eugene100hickey/ATU-2023/main/rexams/data/Methane_final.csv". This gives global methane emissions for (mostly) 2022. Calculate the total emissions due to Other from Central and South America.

generalfeedback.text: Use read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eugene100hickey/ATU-2023/main/rexams/data/Methane_final.csv") followed by group_by(type, region) |> summarise(total = sum(emmisions)) |> ungroup().
